response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional piece is not just an item; it's a statement of excellence that can significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we believe its value exceeds $15,000. For a limited time, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. If you're interested in learning more about the product or discussing the details further, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 18000}
